00035 /**
00036  * @brief Supply a little how/what/why about the algorithms this
00037  * class performs and what parameters it takes.
00038  * @return SelfDoc
00039  */
00040 SelfDoc CNIntensityAdjustmentMethodPDNN::explainSelf()
00041 {
00042     CNIntensityAdjustmentMethodPDNN obj;
00043     SelfDoc doc;
00044     doc.setDocName(obj.getType());
00045     doc.setDocDescription(obj.getDescription());
00046     doc.setDocOptions(obj.getDefaultDocOptions());
00047     return doc;
00048 }

00050 /**
00051  * @brief Default Getter method for parameters and their documentation.
00052  * @return map of parameters and their descriptions.
00053  */
00054 std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> CNIntensityAdjustmentMethodPDNN::getDefaultDocOptions()
00055 {
00056     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts;
00057 
00058     // SelfDoc::Opt(name, type, value, default, min, max, description)
00059     SelfDoc::Opt PIBinCount = {"predicted-intensity-bin-count", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "20", "20", "1", "126", "Predicted Intensity bin count."};
00060     opts.push_back(PIBinCount);
00061 
00062     SelfDoc::Opt GCBinCount = {"gc-bin-count", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "20", "20", "1", "126", "Predicted Intensity bin count."};
00063     opts.push_back(GCBinCount);
00064 
00065     SelfDoc::Opt ResidualTrim = {"residual-trim", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "2.0", "2.0", "NA", "NA", "Residual Trim value."};
00066     opts.push_back(ResidualTrim);
00067 
00068     return opts;
00069 }

00071 /**
00072  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00073  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00074  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00075  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00076  *
00077  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00078  *
00079  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00080  */
00081 SelfCreate* CNIntensityAdjustmentMethodPDNN::newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string>& params)
00082 {
00083     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00084     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00085     CNIntensityAdjustmentMethodPDNN* pMethod = new CNIntensityAdjustmentMethodPDNN();
00086     std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00087 
00088     pMethod->m_iPIBinCount = setupIntParameter("predicted-intensity-bin-count", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00089     pMethod->m_iGCBinCount = setupIntParameter("gc-bin-count", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00090     pMethod->m_dResidualTrim = setupDoubleParameter("residual-trim", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00091 
00092     return pMethod;
00093 }

00098 CNIntensityAdjustmentMethodPDNN::CNIntensityAdjustmentMethodPDNN()
00099 {
00100     m_iPIBinCount = 0;
00101     m_iGCBinCount = 0;
00102     m_dResidualTrim = 0;
00103     m_pvProbes = NULL;
00104         m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined=false;
00105 }

00107 void CNIntensityAdjustmentMethodPDNN::determineLocalProbeSets()
00108 {
00109         if(m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined)
00110         {
00111                 return;
00112         }
00113 
00114         int iNumberOfProbeSets=CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getCount();
00115         for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex<iNumberOfProbeSets; iIndex++)
00116         {
00117                 if( CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex)->processAll() )
00118                 {
00119                         getProbeSets()->add( CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex));
00120                 }
00121         }
00122         m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined=true;
00123 }

00128 /**
00129  * @brief Run the analysis.
00130  */
00131 void CNIntensityAdjustmentMethodPDNN::run()
00132 {
00133     Verbose::out(1, "CNIntensityAdjustmentMethodPDNN::run(...) start");
00134     isSetup();
00135 
00136 //  First filter out the probes so that they all come from probeSets that have process flag 1,2 or 3.
00137 //  Note that this means that they will have been read from the annotations file.
00138 
00139         determineLocalProbeSets();
00140 
00141         std::vector<CNProbe*> pvPDNNProbes;
00142         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < m_pvProbes->getCount()); iIndex++)
00143         {
00144                 if( CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(m_pvProbes->getAt(iIndex)->getProbeSetIndex())->processAll() )
00145                 {
00146                        pvPDNNProbes.push_back(m_pvProbes->getAt(iIndex));
00147                 }
00148         }
00149 
00150     std::vector<int> vBinIndexes(pvPDNNProbes.size());
00151     if (getExperiment()->getIndex() == 0)
00152     {
00153         //Predicted Intensity bins
00154         std::vector<int> vPIBinIndexes(pvPDNNProbes.size());
00155         std::vector<float> vPredictedIntensities(pvPDNNProbes.size());
00156         for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < pvPDNNProbes.size(); iIndex++)
00157         {
00158             vPredictedIntensities[iIndex] = pvPDNNProbes[iIndex]->getPredictedIntensity();
00159         }
00160         bin(vPredictedIntensities, vPIBinIndexes, m_iPIBinCount);
00161 
00162         // GC bins
00163         int iGCCount = 0;
00164         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iIndex++)
00165         {
00166             if (getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex)->getGCContent() != 0 ) {iGCCount++;}
00167         }
00168         AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vGCTemp(iGCCount);
00169         iGCCount = 0;
00170         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iIndex++)
00171         {
00172             if (getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex)->getGCContent() != 0)
00173             {
00174                 vGCTemp.set(iGCCount, getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex)->getGCContent());
00175                 iGCCount++;
00176             }
00177         }
00178         double dGCMedian = vGCTemp.median();
00179         std::vector<int> vGCBinIndexes(pvPDNNProbes.size());
00180         std::vector<float> vGCContent(pvPDNNProbes.size());
00181         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < pvPDNNProbes.size()); iIndex++)
00182         {
00183             if (pvPDNNProbes[iIndex]->getProbeSetIndex() == -1)
00184             {
00185                 vGCContent[iIndex] = dGCMedian;
00186             }
00187             else
00188             {
00189                 vGCContent[iIndex] = CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(pvPDNNProbes[iIndex]->getProbeSetIndex()) ->getGCContent();
00190                 if (vGCContent[iIndex] == 0) {vGCContent[iIndex] = dGCMedian;}
00191             }
00192         }
00193         bin(vGCContent, vGCBinIndexes, m_iGCBinCount);
00194 
00195         // Set overall bin index.
00196         // int iBinCount = m_iPIBinCount * m_iGCBinCount;
00197         for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < pvPDNNProbes.size()); iRowIndex++)
00198         {
00199             vBinIndexes[iRowIndex] = ((vPIBinIndexes[iRowIndex] * m_iGCBinCount) + vGCBinIndexes[iRowIndex]);
00200             pvPDNNProbes[iRowIndex]->setPDNNBin(vBinIndexes[iRowIndex]);
00201         }
00202     }
00203     else
00204     {
00205         for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < pvPDNNProbes.size()); iRowIndex++)
00206         {
00207             vBinIndexes[iRowIndex] = pvPDNNProbes[iRowIndex]->getPDNNBin();
00208         }
00209     }
00210 
00211     // Apply adjustment.
00212     int iBinCount = m_iPIBinCount * m_iGCBinCount;
00213     Verbose::progressBegin(1, "CNAnalysisMethodChipstream::adjustIntensitiesPDNN(...) ", (iBinCount / 100), 1, (iBinCount / 100));
00214     for (int iBinIndex = 0; (iBinIndex < iBinCount); iBinIndex++)
00215     {
00216         if ((iBinIndex % 100) == 0) {Verbose::progressStep(1);}
00217         // Get autosome count per bin.
00218         int iAutosomeProbeCount = 0;
00219         for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < pvPDNNProbes.size()); iRowIndex++)
00220         {
00221             if (vBinIndexes[iRowIndex] == iBinIndex)
00222             {
00223                 if (CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(pvPDNNProbes[iRowIndex]->getProbeSetIndex())->getChromosome() < m_iXChromosome) // is autosome.
00224                 {
00225                     iAutosomeProbeCount++;
00226                 }
00227             }
00228         }
00229         // Calculate autosome median for each bin.
00230         AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vNormalizedIntensities(iAutosomeProbeCount);
00231         AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vMedianNormalizedIntensities(iAutosomeProbeCount);
00232         int iIndex = 0;
00233         for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < pvPDNNProbes.size()); iRowIndex++)
00234         {
00235             if (vBinIndexes[iRowIndex] == iBinIndex)
00236             {
00237                 if (CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(pvPDNNProbes[iRowIndex]->getProbeSetIndex())->getChromosome() < m_iXChromosome) // is autosome.
00238                 {
00239                     vNormalizedIntensities.set(iIndex, log(pvPDNNProbes[iRowIndex]->getIntensity()));
00240                     vMedianNormalizedIntensities.set(iIndex, log(pvPDNNProbes[iRowIndex]->getMedianIntensity()));
00241                     iIndex++;
00242                 }
00243             }
00244         }
00245         // Perform actual intensity adjustment.
00246         double dMedianNormalizedIntensities = vNormalizedIntensities.median();
00247         double dMedianMedianNormalizedIntensities = vMedianNormalizedIntensities.median();
00248         float fResidual = 0;
00249         for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < pvPDNNProbes.size()); iRowIndex++)
00250         {
00251             if (vBinIndexes[iRowIndex] == iBinIndex)
00252             {
00253                 if (iAutosomeProbeCount == 0) {pvPDNNProbes[iRowIndex]->setResidual(0);}
00254                 else
00255                 {
00256                     float fIntensity = log(pvPDNNProbes[iRowIndex]->getIntensity());
00257                     fIntensity = fIntensity - dMedianNormalizedIntensities + dMedianMedianNormalizedIntensities;
00258                     fResidual = fIntensity - dMedianMedianNormalizedIntensities;
00259                     if (fResidual > m_dResidualTrim) {fResidual = (float)m_dResidualTrim;}
00260                     else if (fResidual < -m_dResidualTrim) {fResidual = (float)-m_dResidualTrim;}
00261                     pvPDNNProbes[iRowIndex]->setIntensity(exp(fIntensity));
00262                     pvPDNNProbes[iRowIndex]->setResidual(fResidual);
00263                 }
00264             }
00265         }
00266     }
00267 
00268         if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("keep-intermediate-data"))
00269         {
00270                 writeIntensities("pdnn");
00271         }
00272 
00273     Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done");
00274 
00275 /*
00276     if (m_pEngine->getOptInt("array-size") == 2015) // Full array.
00277     {
00278         std::vector<float> vBackground(m_pvProbes->getCount());
00279         HighPassFilter(*m_pEngine).run(vProbeIDs, vResiduals, vBackground);
00280         for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < m_pvProbes->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00281         {
00282             CNProbe* pobjProbe = m_pvProbes->getAt(iRowIndex);
00283             float fIntensity = log(pobjProbe->getIntensity());
00284             fIntensity -= vBackground[iRowIndex];
00285             pobjProbe->setIntensity(exp(fIntensity));
00286         }
00287     }
00288 */
00289     Verbose::out(1, "CNIntensityAdjustmentMethodPDNN::run(...) end");
00290 }
